heading: hubbell denial
subheading: webster hubbell, former no. 3 official in the justice department, called thursday's tax-evasion indictment by the whitewater grand jury nothing but strong-arming, an attempt by prosecutor starr to force him to turn on his old pals the clintons. "i'm not going to lie about the first lady or anyone else," the former justice department official said in denying the accusations, also brought against his wife and accountants.
author: wired staff
